snippet: WALDMAN--Hilda. Died peacefully on May 24, 2016 after suffering a massive stroke. The wife of the late Edward A. Waldman, she was 95. Loving wife, mother and grandmother, she is survived by her son Lawrence and his sons David and Jeffrey. Predeceased by her beloved son, Robert, survived by his children Rachel, Brett and Alexandra. Her brother Edward Schachter, his wife Lucy and daughter Susan Fleisher were very close to her. Hilda grew up in Cologne, Germany and immigrated to the United States in 1938. She married Edward in 1946 and dedicated her life to her family and home. When Edward developed dementia, she worked tirelessly to have him remain at home. Services Friday 11:15am at "The Riverside," 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue. Donations may be made to the Cancer Center, Mount Sinai Hospital. 1/3
